name: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Coliseum DX: The Gathering of The Ultra Heroes
name_original: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Coliseum DX: The Gathering of The Ultra Heroes
description: Daikaijuu Battle: Ultra Coliseum DX - Ultra Senshi Daishuuketsu is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2010.
